label: 掃部寮
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A bureau in the Kunaishō (Imperial Household Ministry) which was responsible for the maintenance, furniture, floor coverings, and blinds of Palace buildings, and for cleaning rooms ad laying mats in preparation for official functions (p. 811). [宮内省]
